instruction: Generate a recipe containing the given ingredients.
output: This easy side dish is sure to be a favorite! Start by boiling 2 potatoes and 2 Carrots in water until they are tender. Drain the vegetables and mash them together. In a separate pot, cook 1/2 cup of butter until it starts to brown. Pour the butter over the mashed vegetables, add 2 tablespoons of fresh parsley and salt and pepper to taste. Serve warm!
